name: mushing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the sport or activity of controlling dogs pulling a vehicle over snow or dry land: They put together teams of dogs and do what is called mushing - that is, they travel through the snowy woods on sleds pulled by the dogs. Alaska has an official sport, dog mushing. The wolves were also seen on the mushing trails throughout the winter.
